item.description:
“It’s not quite breakfast, it’s not quite lunch, but it comes with a slice of cantaloupe at the end. You don’t get completely what you would at breakfast, but you get a good meal.”

Who knows where that quotes from?

Anyway, while the weather is still nice let's get some brunch and network. Teranga's is a highly rated restaurant with an authentic Senegalese menu.
Visit them here: http://www.terangaboston.com/

Finding Us:

Ask the hostess for the meetup group.

Note:

Always check the event page the day of the meetup to see if any details changes. Last minute changes will be posted to the site and sent via email to those that RSVPed.
item.name: Brunch Social
